Package com.checkersgame.ui

Class CheckersGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.checkersgame.ui.CheckersGUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckersGameClient
public class CheckersGUI extends javafx.application.Application
GUI class which extends Application. GUI interface and event handlers to play checkers.
